original_title: Excerpt from 'INDEPENDENCIA 86: The Lost Film of Arturo Madlangbayan'
overview: The EDSA revolution brought an alt to a new form of experimental cinema that was emerging during the Marcos regime. This is a recovered excerpt from a video experiment by the almost unknown director Arturo Madlangbayan, as re-edited by Miko Revereza and Raya Martin.
title: Excerpt from 'INDEPENDENCIA 86: The Lost Film of Arturo Madlangbayan'
